title: FlensKI Indexer Schema
description: This schema describes the data structure for documents which can be added to the knowledge base of the AI assistant.

identifier.description: An identifier of the source. E.g. a filename or a title of a website.

name.description: A human readable reference, e.g. a file title

sourceDateTime.description: UTC format. The date (and time) the source is referring to. E.g. the date of an event (not the date when the source has been downloaded). If time is not relevant, use 00:00.00

title.description: Title of the source. E.g. the title of a web page or the title of a document.

description.description: A short description of the source.

summary.description: A short summary of the source. Can be used for a generated summary.

discoveryDateTime.description: UTC format. The date and time where the source has been discovered. E.g. the datetime where a web source has been scraped.

origin.description: The origin of the source. E.g. Ratsversammlung.

content.description: Text content which will be added to the knowledge base. If left empty, the indexer will try to download from the sourceUrl provided.
